body: query { sessionbycustomerandsecondaryidentifier (customer:"rama@damunaste.org", secondary_identifier:{value:"SASDFG123P", type:"session.alias"}){ id, alias, customer { id, firstname, lastname, address { line1, line2, city, state, zip } }, affiliate { id, affiliate_id, created_at, updated_at }, subaffiliate_1 { id, affiliate_id, created_at, updated_at }, subaffiliate_2 { id, affiliate_id, created_at, updated_at }, subaffiliate_3 { id, affiliate_id, created_at, updated_at }, subaffiliate_4 { id, affiliate_id, created_at, updated_at }, subaffiliate_5 { id, affiliate_id, created_at, updated_at }, cid { id, affiliate_id, created_at, updated_at }, created_at, updated_at } }
